detail_desc: Leggings in stretch fabric. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases down the front and raw-edge hems.
Short, gently fitted dress in satin with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip at the back of the neck, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Unlined.
Vest top in patterned mesh with deep armholes and a racer back.
Wide, slightly boxy-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Scarf in a thin weave with short, raw-edge fringes along the sides. Size approx. 60x200 cm.
Dungaree dress in soft, lightweight cotton denim with adjustable straps and a heart-shaped pocket at the top. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt.
3/4-length jumpsuit in viscose jersey with a deep wrapover V-neck, long sleeves, a seam with narrow, concealed elastication under the bust and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, wide cuffs with a covered button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a seam and drawstring at the waist.

Short dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening at the top and a small, pleated stand-up collar with ties at the front. Pleated, double-layered flutter sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a wider neckline and flounce at the top and over the shoulders. Concealed elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Sports bra in soft stretch fabric with a nursing function. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, racer back with a cut-out section and reinforced shoulder straps. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless. Extra firm support.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Suede laptop case with a zip at the top and cotton lining. Fits 13" laptops.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Dress in a sturdy jacquard knit made from a recycled polyester blend containing glittery threads. Round neckline and shoulder pads for defined shoulders. Concealed zip at the back made partly from recycled polyester.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle at one side. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey, one patterned.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Glittery tulle skirt with a shimmering elastic waistband. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in a soft, rib knit with a low neckline and button placket.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly. Straight cut to the hem.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in sturdy organic cotton jersey with elastication at the back of the waist and straps with adjustable buttoning. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Long, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and a hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, diagonal front pockets, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbing at the cuffs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine, printed knit with slits in the sides.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide trim at the hem.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and open chest pocket.
Shorts in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets with a button. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a high waist, zip fly and button, and side pockets. Wide, straight legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.

Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and wide, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathers at the back of the neck to create soft draping, and a rounded hem.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Fully lined windbreaker in woven fabric with a hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets with press-studs and sturdy, elasticated trims at the cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in a textured weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, soft jersey on the inside of the chin and a wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, and elastication at the waist and cuffs. Longer at the back with a small vent. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Calf-length, fitted lace skirt with a concealed zip at the back and raw-edge scalloped hem. Lined.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Set of hair accessories with three glittery plastic Alice bands, six glittery metal hair clips and ten hair elastics.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Top in a linen-blend jersey with an asymmetric chiffon lower section and a seam at the waist.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short, broderie anglaise sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sturdy cotton piqué with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ribbed hems.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Swim pants and top in UV-protective fabric. Printed top with short raglan sleeves. Pants with an elasticated waist and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton corduroy with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and a back pocket. Jersey lining.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with decorative buttons down the front, a fake fly and raw-edge, cut-off hem. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum fit.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams, a jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back.

Non-wired bandeau bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, lined, gently padded cups with removable inserts, narrow detachable shoulder straps and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims down the sides and at the hems.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width 10 cm.

Knee-length dress in a softly draping weave with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Body in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front in a narrow cut at the top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Straight-cut silk shirt with a small stand-up collar, bib front with pin-tucks, and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in cotton jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wide lace trim at the top and hem. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy, crinkled weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front and back. Elasticated cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum. Unlined.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with a flounced front section and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with a flounce at the top.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
